entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. High minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
